archimate:BusinessObject.name: Pre-screening Standards
archimate:BusinessObject.documentation:
Requirement Ability to create pre-screening questionnaires (screening questions presented to applicants in conjunction with the application forms) in the system for applicants to complete as part of the application process, and to set which questions require a response.
Every external applicant will fill out an initial application form when they create their profile.
The Recruiter will have the ability to create, edit or add the questionnaire and add it to a specific job posting.
Ability to select which questionnaires to use for a posting.
Questionnaires should be identified at the requisition stage as the job will be posted automatically upon approval.
Ability to set rules that prevent questionnaires from being attached to postings of a certain type (for example, APAD and excluded postings are the only internal postings that can have a questionnaire).
This should be determined from the Labour Agreement.
These questionnaires will be developed by TA and attached to certain roles.
